function.name: search_by_identifier
function.description: Search for a HubSpot contact using ONLY a valid email address or phone number. Does NOT accept names or partial information. You must have a complete email (with @ and .) or phone number (minimum 7 digits) to use this tool.

query.description: A valid email address (must contain @ and .) OR a phone number (minimum 7 digits with optional + or - characters). Examples of VALID queries: 'taha@gmail.com', '+92-321-456-987', '3214569870'. Examples of INVALID queries: 'Taha', 'John Doe', 'taha' (these are names and will NOT work).
